name: Online Card Game
description:
In this little game players will battle each other with 3 heroes and a deck of your choice. Strategize and plan your deck with the deck builder before you go into battle. 

This game requires 2 players! So grab a friend and figure out how to play and what works for you. 

The idea is that each player take turns to play 1 card on one of the 3 heroes. Once each player skip their turn, the round will progress to the next stage where heroes act out the cards that were played. We had a small scope for the game, but we did have some big ideas for the game.

Online functionality was created with Photon in Unity.
